manifest.author: Kolja Sam Pluemer
manifest.name: The Queue
manifest.description: Randomly exposes you to notes from your vault. Supports habits, to-dos, spaced repetition flashcards, iterative reading and more.

manifest.name: Incremental ID
manifest.description: Allow to generate Jira like ids.

manifest.name: BookXNote Sync
manifest.description: 从bookxnote中同步笔记

manifest.author: Michael Vetkin
manifest.name: Tengwar

manifest.author: Alec Sibilia
manifest.name: Quick Emoji
manifest.description: Quick, in-editor, emoji inserting. Type ":" to start selecting an emoji to insert.

manifest.author: Andrew Brereton
manifest.name: iCal
manifest.description: Scans your vault for tasks. Creates an iCal file and stores it on Gist. You can then show this calendar in any iCal compatible client such as Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.

manifest.author: Marc Feininger
manifest.name: FileName Styler
manifest.description: Customize and style file names in the file explorer using patterns, prefixes, suffixes, colors, and icons.

manifest.author: Andrew McGivery
manifest.name: Ribbon Divider
manifest.description: Allows you to add dividers to the ribbon to space out your icons.

manifest.author: wwwkieran
manifest.name: Multiplatform Highlights Importer
manifest.description: Import and consolidate highlights from different reading sources. Supports reconciling books across reading sources.

manifest.author: Mouadhbendjedidi
manifest.name: Themed Discord RPC
manifest.description: A Customizable Discord RPC

manifest.author: eharris128, r-mahoney, & jsmorabito
manifest.name: Large Language Models
manifest.description: Enables access to LLMs via remote providers (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini) and local LLMs via GPT4ALL.

manifest.author: Edward Cui
manifest.name: Quiz Generator
manifest.description: Generate interactive flashcards from your notes using models from OpenAI (ChatGPT), Google (Gemini), Ollama (local LLMs), and more. Or manually create your own to use with the quiz UI.

manifest.author: Florian Woelki
manifest.name: Better Recall
manifest.description: Add anki-like spaced repetition and recall to your vault.

manifest.author: UD
manifest.name: Checkbox Time Tracker
manifest.description: Insert timestamp when you check off the checkbox

manifest.author: Kageetai
manifest.name: Journal Review
manifest.description: Review your daily notes on their anniversaries, like "what happened today last year".

manifest.author: Luc Marongiu
manifest.name: .url WebView Opener
manifest.description: Opens .url files in the internal webview.

manifest.author: khaelar
manifest.name: Canvas Link Optimizer
manifest.description: Optimize canvas links by displaying a page thumbnail.

manifest.author: AwesomeDog
manifest.name: Awesome Image
manifest.description: One-stop solution for image management.

manifest.author: Giorgos Sarigiannidis
manifest.name: Sentinel
manifest.description: Trigger actions based on document visibility changes.

manifest.author: Chris Kephart
manifest.name: AutoPause
manifest.description: Allows one audio track to be played at a time, pausing or stopping any others.

manifest.author: Hananoshika Yomaru
manifest.name: Markdown Image Caption

manifest.author: Jonas Dam

manifest.author: Nick de Bruin

manifest.description: Adds file support for various file types. Allows viewing and embedding these filetypes. Includes: .kra, .psd, .obj, .glb, .gltf, and more.

manifest.author: Shawn Yang
manifest.name: Hover Reveal
manifest.description: Shows hidden text in tooltips when hovering over marked elements using [visibleText]{tooltipText} syntax.

manifest.description: Embed Bible references and passages in your notes and read the Bible in Obsidian.
